attributes.description:
New Arrival @ Bidvest McCarthy Silverlakes. 2021 Nissan X-Trail silver color 4x4 A/T with 22000kms. 

Test drives at your door, depending on your location. All vehicles come with certificates from Dekra. 
Trade-Ins are welcome. Delivery to your door. 

Finance Requirements: 
1. Copy of ID 
2. Copy of Driver’s License 
3. Proof of Address 
4. 3 Months Bank Statements & 3 Months Payslips. 

Price excluding License and Registration as well as Delivery Fee and is subject to your location. Contact 

*Mac from Bidvest McCarthy Isuzu, we are based in Pretoria Silverlakes. 

Phone & WhatsApp: 0645472149

attributes.description:
The vehicle is a 2018 Ford Mustang 5.0 GT Fastback Auto with powerful engine and remarkably docile. The Mustang is an enjoyable vehicle to drive. Its steering is quick and responsive and the vehicle feels stable around sharp turns. It comes with power steering, keyless entry/start, reverse camera, multi-functioning steering, radio/Bluetooth connectivity, climate/cruise control, xenon headlights, electric seats, electric windows, electric mirrors, black leather seats/steering wheel, heated/ventilated seats and 19 inch wheels. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client is highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. Our price excludes additional costs such as license, registration and COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
#10267
